scripts.migrate:migrations: dotenv -e .env.local -- powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path './scripts/migrations' -Filter *.sql | Sort-Object Name | ForEach-Object { Get-Content $_.FullName | & 'C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe' -u $env:DB_USER --password=$env:DB_PASSWORD --host=$env:DB_HOST --port=$env:DB_PORT --database=$env:DB_NAME }"
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:baseline && npm run migrate:migrations
